title: Denial of Presidential Permit for the Kickapoo Traditional Tribe of Texas
summary: A Presidential Memorandum dated December 16, 2025, announces the denial of a Presidential Permit for the Kickapoo Traditional Tribe of Texas. The permit was sought to construct, maintain, and operate a commercial and personally owned vehicle crossing on the U.S. border with Mexico in Eagle Pass, Texas. The denial is based on the recommendation that issuing the permit is not in the foreign policy interest of the United States and that the project is not in the U.S. national interest.
